ApiKey.title: ApiKey
ApiKey.description: Represents an API Key used for authenticating with external services.

service.description: The name of the service this key is for (e.g., 'WhatsApp Business', 'Twilio').

description.description: A user-provided description for the API key's purpose.

key.description: The actual API key value (should be encrypted at rest).

status.description: The status of the API key.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the API key was created.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this key.

ExposedApi.title: ExposedApi
ExposedApi.description: Represents an API endpoint exposed by this platform for consumption by external systems.

name.description: The human-readable name of the exposed API.

description.description: A detailed description of what the API does.

endpoint.description: The relative path of the API endpoint (e.g., /api/v1/send-message).

method.description: The HTTP method for the endpoint.

status.description: The current status of the API.

version.description: The version string for the API (e.g., '1.0.0').

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this exposed API.

ApiLog.title: ApiLog
ApiLog.description: Stores logs of API requests and responses.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response.

DashboardUser.title: DashboardUser
DashboardUser.description: Represents a user who has access to the admin dashboard.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a chat conversation with a contact.

contactId.description: Phone number for WhatsApp or other identifier

/users/{userId}/apiKeys/{apiKeyId}.description: Stores API keys for a user.

/users/{userId}/exposedApis/{exposedApiI.description: Stores APIs exposed by a user.

/users/{userId}/conversations/{conversat.description: Stores all chat conversations for a user.

/apiLogs/{apiLogId}.description: Global collection for API logs from all users and services.

/dashboardUsers/{dashboardUserId}.description: Collection of all users who can access the dashboard.
